abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: arena-trap
abilities.effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by flying-types and Pokémon in the air.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
